entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: N 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
